question: Which of the following categories do you belong to?
options: I am a person with full legal capacity in Greece, and I own, possess, and manage at least five (5) beehives within Greek territory as the exclusive owner.

I am a person with full legal capacity in Greece, I own fewer than five (5) beehives within Greek territory, and I wish to acquire the status of an active beekeeper and the privileges that come with it.
I do not belong to any of the above categories.

question: Are you a natural person or a legal entity?
Are you a permanent and legal resident of Greece, or is your headquarters in Greece?
Which of the following categories do you or the legal representative of the legal entity belong to?
options: Greek citizen or a citizen of an EU Member State.

question: Do you belong to any of the following categories?
options: The beehives in possession were acquired through purchase.
The beehives in possession were acquired through transfer or inheritance.
I do not belong to any of the above categories.
